description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9f16t","text":"This protocol describe the workflow for fractioning wastewater and performing RNA isolation from each fraction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

fork_info.title: Protocol for Safe, Affordable, and Reproducible Isolation of SARS-CoV-2 RNA from Wastewater

forks.title: Protocol for Isolation of total RNA from Wastewater

groups.title: APHL Wastewater Surveillance Community of Practice

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"3bnen","text":"Use good lab practices at all times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hdh6","text":"Prior to performing any procedure, ensure that proper PPE is donned.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"73id5","text":"Clean all work surfaces and instruments (i.e., pipettes, vortexes, centrifuges) with 10% bleach followed by 70% ethanol.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejsbb","text":"Work with wastewater in a biosafety cabinet inside a BSL-2 laboratory.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3gdc","text":"β-Mercaptoethanol is to be used only in a chemical fume hood.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"kjbg","text":" Equipment and Consumables","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"djrbt","text":"–80 °C freezer to store water samples","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b5vdv","text":"–20 °C freezer to store detection reagents","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4khod","text":"4 °C refrigerator storage of samples and reagents","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bu1n0","text":"P10, P100 or P200, and P1000 pipettes. It is strongly recommended to use different sets of pipettes for the extraction of RNA and RT-qPCR.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"72jr3","text":"Centrifuge (up to 12,000 x g) and rotor for 50 mL tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bh85v","text":"Water bath","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bfet5","text":"Polypropylene 50 mL Oak Ridge Tubes (ThermoFisher™Cat. No.  3139-0030)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4ivvh","text":"Corning™ 50 mL tubes (Fisher Scientific Cat. No. 430290)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"87m9r","text":"Filter tips to fit all pipette sizes. Only filtered tips should be used for each step in the protocol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dbpav","text":"150 mL Vacuum Filter/Storage Bottle System, 0.22 µm Pore 13.6cm² CA Membrane (Corning™ 430769) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"17k1s","text":"Alternatively, 0.22 µm syringe filters have been used (Filters:  MilliporeSigma™ Cat. No. SLGP033RB; Syringes: Becton Dickinson™ Cat. No. 309654)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f2qou","text":"Pasteur pipettes (Fisher Scientific™ Cat. No. 22-183632)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dr24v","text":"1.5mL microcentrifuge tubes (USA Scientific Cat. No. 1615-5510)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6iv27","text":"0.2 mL PCR tubes (Eppendorf™0030124847)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7622v","text":" Applied Biosystems™ MicroAmp™ Fast Optic 48-Well Reaction Plate (ThermoFisher Scientific Cat. No. 43-758-16).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c6l50","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b8gc2","text":"Solutions/Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6gqtb","text":"Polyethylene glycol 8000 (Fisher Scientific™ Cat. No. BP233-1)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a9l40","text":"Sodium chloride (Fisher Scientific™Cat. No.  BP358-10)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6k0qr","text":"TE buffer (Fisher Scientific Cat. No. BP2473500). ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"acac4","text":"TRIzol™ Reagent (Invitrogen™ Cat. No. 15596018)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9f58q","text":"Chloroform (Fisher Scientific™ Cat. No. BP1145-1)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b0rfi","text":"Nuclease-free DEPC-treated water (Cat. No. AM9906) (10 x 50 mL)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4hu9v","text":"Ethanol, Absolute (200 Proof), Molecular Biology Grade (Fisher Scientific™ A4094)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fq5hj","text":"2% Safranin Solution (Sigma-Aldrich Cat. No. 1092170500)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5mr4q","text":"Isopropanol (Fisher Scientific™ BP26181)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bg0k1","text":"Takara One Step PrimeScript III RT-PCR Kit (2x) (Takara™ RR064B) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"846ae","text":"ROX Reference Dye (Invitrogen™ LS12223012) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"42ae0","text":"2019-nCoV RUO N1 primers/probe (IDT) (Cat. No.10006713) (750 µL; 500 reactions)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"24qq3","text":"Custom BCoV qPCR assay (primers/probe)(IDT)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4mhfo","text":"Twist RNA (Cat. No. SKU# 102019)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"66c7o","text":"BCoV Standard gBlocks® Gene Fragment","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"boue5","text":"Calf-Guard® Bovine Rota Coronavirus vaccine (Zoetis, Cat. No. 540463)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":43}],"data":[]},{"key":"bkg1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eh1tt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"889946206D3611EBB4699B5798754929","url":"https://www.qcsupply.com/540463-calf-guard.html?msclkid=a949b5da14831c943bcceb0b057d7ce9"}}}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cejtp","text":"Sample handling","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctlie","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61c37","text":"The samples must be kept at 4°C at all times after collection. Keep wastewater sample containers closed throughout the entire procedure except where noted. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kj4e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5978p","text":"Wastewater preparation and fractioning is to be performed in a biosafety cabinet inside a BSL-2 laboratory.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79h5g","text":"Preparing wastewater sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10nst","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6tph0","text":"Label 10 50 ml conical tubes MM/DD/YYYY, WW type, collection location (i.e., 01/12/2024, 24-hour composite, LANL TA-46)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bqic","text":"Transfer 45 ml of wastewater to 10 50 ml conical tubes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6shkp","text":"Add 5 ml 10X PBS pH 7.4 to each tube and mix thoroughly by inverting.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7f0ps","text":"Store 5 of the 50 ml conical tubes at -80° C and proceed to the next steps with the remaining 5.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6uuk6","text":"Fractioning wastewater","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8sa4c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5c2v","text":"Transfer 1 ml of wastewater from one of the 5 50 ml conical tubes and add it to a 5 ml PowerWater Bead Tube (Fraction 1).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":109,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rjln","text":"Centrifuge the 5 50 ml conical tubes at 7000 x g for 10 minutes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68t9a","text":"Carefully decant the supernatant into an appropriately sized (\u003e500 ml) sterile beaker.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8qe9","text":"Combine the remaining liquid and pellets from each 50 ml conical tube into one of the 50 ml conical tubes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e56ee","text":"Centrifuge the 50 ml conical tube at 7000 x g for 2 minutes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fj8mq","text":"Remove the supernatant from the tube.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cgff","text":"Add 200 µl 1X PBS pH 7.4 to the pellet, and carefully transfer (by decanting and lightly scraping with a pipette tip) into a 5 ml PowerWater Bead Tube (Fraction 2).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":152,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bn56l","text":"Assemble a vacuum filter flask system with a 0.22 µm filter (Durapore‱ Membrane Filter, Millipore Sigma GVWP04700).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5fp9g","text":"Pass the supernatant collected in step 4 through the filter for 15 minutes (filter may eventually become clogged).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5056v","text":"Discard any remaining supernatant.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o9fc","text":"Disassemble the vacuum filter flask system.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c446m","text":"Using sterile forceps, carefully roll the 0.22 µm filter and transfer it to a 5 ml PowerWater Bead Tube (Fraction 3).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":105,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5hgf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnpmd","text":"Note: Fractions can be stored at 4° C for 72 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BD97DF4CB18D11EEB4AD0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5hao3","text":"RNA extraction and isolation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"275c1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsk5u","text":"RNA extraction and isolation utilized the Qiagen RNeasy PowerWater Kit (Qiagen 14700-50-NF) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b718","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f68kb","text":"Before starting procedure:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8javl","text":" Warm Solution PM1 at 55°C for 5-10 minutes prior to use.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7oamq","text":"Shake to mix Solution PM5 prior to use.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fldep","text":"Prepare DNase I stock enzyme by adding 550 ul of RNase-Free water to the Dnase I (RNase-Free) lyophilized powder and mixing gently. Aliquot the DNase I stock enzyme in 50 ul proportions and store at -20°C for long term storage (but do not freeze/thaw more than 3 times). To prepare DNase I Solution, thaw and combine 5 ul of DNase I stock enzyme with 45 ul of DNase Digestion Solution per prep.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gr7t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8sfhb","text":"Sample lysis:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vue0","text":"In a fume hood, add 990 ml of warm Solution PM1 and 10 ul of β-Mercaptoethanol (Millipore 444203) to the PowerWater Bead Tubes containing Fractions 1, 2, and 3.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5orb7","text":"Ensure that the caps of the PowerWater Bead Tubes are secure and place them horizontally in a vortex adapter with the caps pointing toward the center of the vortex adapter.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4u3qk","text":"Vortex at maximum speed for 5 min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3c01i","text":"Place PowerWater Bead Tubes in empty 50 ml conical tubes and centrifuge at 4000 x g for 1 min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btkv","text":"Remove PowerWater Bead Tubes from teh 50 ml conical tubes with forceps.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"779lq","text":"Transfer 1 ml of the supernatant by pipetting with a 1 ml pipette tip from down in the beads to clean 2 ml Collection Tubes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"705nb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58v5e","text":"RNA isolation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"i3b2","text":"Centrifuge 2 ml Collection Tubes at 13,000 x g for 1 min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hg02","text":"Avoiding the pellet, transfer the supernatant to clean 2 ml Collection Tubes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dk0op","text":"Add 200 µl of Solution IRS and vortex briefly to mix. Incubate at 2-8°C for 5 min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"s34b","text":"Centrifuge 2 ml Collection Tubes at 13,000 x g for 1 min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1v2r4","text":"Avoiding the pellet, transfer 650 μl the supernatant to clean 2 ml Collection Tubes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bu16c","text":"Add 650 µl of Solution PM3.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d83mq","text":"Add 650 µl of Solution PM4.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1471v","text":"Vortex briefly to mix.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apqul","text":"Load 650 µl of supernatant onto an MB RNA Spin Column.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9defk","text":"Centrifuge at 13,000 x g for 1 min. Discard flow through and repeat until all the supernatant has been loaded.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"651pp","text":"Add 650 µl of Solution PM5 and centrifuge at 13,000 x g  for 1 min. Discard flow through.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dllqs","text":"Centrifuge again at 13,000 x g for 1 minute to dry membrane and place the MB RNA Spin Column into a clean 2 ml Collection Tube.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b32ce","text":"Add 50 µl of DNase I Solution to the center of the membrane and incubate at room temperature for 15 min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qqof","text":"Add 400 µl of Solution PM7 and centrifuge the column at 13,000 x g for 1 min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eli4r","text":"Discard flow through and add 650 µl of Solution PM4, centrifuge at 13,000 x g for 1 min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77us0","text":"Discard flow through and centrifuge again at 13,000 x g for 2 min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cgp","text":"Place the MB RNA Spin Column into a clean 2 ml Collection Tube.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5nob","text":"Add 100 µl of RNase-Free Water to the center of the white filter membrane.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vfbl","text":"Centrifuge at 13,000 x g for 1 min. Discard the MB RNA Spin Column.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jscm","text":"Eluted RNA is ready for downstream applications.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cibo8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Protocol for Isolation of total RNA from Wastewater

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"e8nja","text":"Wastewater is only to be worked with in a biosafety cabinet inside a BSL-2 laboratory.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6n2fg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"difan","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
